page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl socket class read method
page.description: The INET::SSLSocket::Read() method reads characters from the connection into a string.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Read(Data BYREF as C [, Length as N [, Timeout as N [, ReadExact as L]]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data BYREF
argument.description: The data received from the connection.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (no limit). The number of characters to read.

argument.name: Timeout
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (no timeout). The number of seconds before the method returns.
